title:
Derived equivalence for the simple flop of type $G_2^{\dagger}$ via
  tilting bundles
abstract:
The aim of this article is to prove the derived equivalence for a local model
of the simple flop of type $G_2^{\dagger}$, which was found by Kanemitsu. This
flop is the only known simple flop that comes from a non-homogeneous roof. The
proof of the derived equivalence is done by using tilting bundles, and also
produces a noncommutative crepant resolution of the singularity that is derived
equivalent to both sides of the flop.
